message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe would be very valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $12,000?
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is below what I can accept.  Could you meet me halfway at $13,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I am still looking to keep the cost under $12,000. Can we find a middle ground that suits both of us?
